item.title: Kids With the Greatest Number of Candies
item.description: Given the array candies and the integer extraCandies, where candies[i] represents the number of candies that the ith kid has.

item.title: Running Sum of 1d Array
item.description: Running Sum of 1d Array Given an array nums. We define a running sum of an array as runningSum[i] = sum(nums[0]…nums[i]).
